sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SCHWABE, Samuel Heinrich (1789-1875), German amateur astronomer, was born on 25th October 1789 at Dessau, where he died on 11th April 1875 ; he observed the sun-spots regularly from 1826 and pointed out (in 1843) the periodicity in the number of these objects.
